pageTitles.outfits.item.null: There is no outfit with this id!
pageTitles.items.item.null: There is no item with this id!

pageDescriptions.error: Oops! Something went wrong. Don't worry, we're on it.
pageDescriptions.outfits: Organize your wardrobe effortlessly and create stylish outfits.
pageDescriptions.items: Discover a wide range of items to elevate your wardrobe game.
pageDescriptions.signIn: Sign in to access your wardrobe, outfits, and personalized fashion experience.
pageDescriptions.logIn: Log in to your account and explore your personalized fashion vault.
pageDescriptions.forgotPassword: Forgot your password? No worries! Reset it quickly and get back to styling.
pageDescriptions.resetPassword: Reset your password securely and regain access to your account.
pageDescriptions.create: Easily add new items or outfits to your wardrobe for endless styling options.
pageDescriptions.account: Access your account dashboard for a personalized fashion experience.
pageDescriptions.settings: Customize your settings for an optimized fashion vault experience.
pageDescriptions.planner: Customize your outfit planner settings for a tailored fashion experience.
pageDescriptions.resetEmail: Reset your email preferences easily. Stay updated with our latest fashion trends.
pageDescriptions.home: Discover your style sanctuary at My Fashion Vault. Streamline your wardrobe, plan outfits effortlessly, and embrace endless fashion possibilities. Authenticate, organize, and elevate your style game with us. Join now for a seamless fashion experience!
pageDescriptions.privacyPolicy: Learn how we protect your privacy at My Fashion Vault. Our Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information. Your privacy matters to us. Read more.
pageDescriptions.termsOfUse: Read the Terms of Use for My Fashion Vault. By accessing or using our website, you agree to these terms governing your use of our services. Learn more.
pageDescriptions.feed: Explore a world of style and inspiration on My Fashion Vault's feed. Discover the latest trends, outfits, and fashion inspirations from our vibrant community. Join us today and be part of the fashion conversation.
pageDescriptions.following: Stay connected with your fashion circle! Explore the latest styles and trends from the users you follow on My Fashion Vault. Discover new inspirations and share your fashion journey with like-minded individuals.

hero.description: Create your virtual wardrobe and plan your outfits for each day of the week!

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.addClothes: Ability to add all your clothes

home.typewriterSentence: Welcome to My Fashion Vault! Your ultimate wardrobe companion. Organize, plan, and create effortlessly with our intuitive platform. Add your clothes, and curate endless outfit possibilities. Simplify your daily styling routine and elevate your fashion game with us. Join now!

item1.title: Add clothes
item1.description: Add your clothes with their name, color, category and more. You can view them, filter them and do so much more!

item2.title: Make outfits
item2.description: With the clothes you added, you can group them into outfits.

item3.title: Share your creations
item3.description: Once you create an outfit you are proud of, you can share the link to it so peoples can get inspired by your creative mind.

item4.title: Plan your outfits
item4.description: You can assign outfits to everyday of the week to plan your clothes rotation.

account.LogOutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?

item.name: Item

item.noColor: The item must have at least one color
item.noType: The item must have a type

item.noImage: The item must have an image

removeBackground.title: Remove background

outfit.noItems: You don't have any items in your wardrobe yet. Add some to create an outfit!
outfit.nameTooLong: The outfit's name is too long
outfit.outfitNameDesc: Add a name to your outfit

signIn.incorrectUsername: Usernames can only consist of letters, numbers, and special characters!
signIn.usernameTooShort: Usernames must be at least 6 characters long!
signIn.incorrectPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters long!

errors.passwordTooShort: The password must be at least 8 characters long!
